com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions

Interface ExoplayerWrapper.InfoListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ExoplayerWrapper

    public static interface ExoplayerWrapper.InfoListener
    A listener for debugging information.

    • Method Detail

      • onVideoFormatEnabled

        void onVideoFormatEnabled(java.lang.String formatId,
                        int trigger,
                        int mediaTimeMs)
        Respond to a change in the format of the video.
        Parameters:
        formatId - The new format of the video.
        trigger - The reason for a chunk being selected.
        mediaTimeMs - The start time of the media contained by the chunk, in microseconds.

      • onAudioFormatEnabled

        void onAudioFormatEnabled(java.lang.String formatId,
                        int trigger,
                        int mediaTimeMs)
        Respond to a change in the audio format.
        Parameters:
        formatId - The new format of the audio.
        trigger - The reason for a chunk being selected.
        mediaTimeMs - The start time of the media contained by the chunk, in microseconds.

      • onDroppedFrames

        void onDroppedFrames(int count,
                   long elapsed)
        Respond to frame drops.
        Parameters:
        count - The number of dropped frames.
        elapsed - The number of milliseconds in which the frames were dropped.

      • onBandwidthSample

        void onBandwidthSample(int elapsedMs,
                     long bytes,
                     long bandwidthEstimate)
        Respond to a new estimate of the bandwidth.
        Parameters:
        elapsedMs - The duration of the sampling period in milliseconds.
        bytes - The number of bytes received during the sampling period.
        bandwidthEstimate - The estimated bandwidth in bytes/sec, or #NO_ESTIMATE if no estimate is available. Note that this estimate is typically derived from more information than bytes and elapsedMs.

      • onLoadStarted

        void onLoadStarted(int sourceId,
                 java.lang.String formatId,
                 int trigger,
                 boolean isInitialization,
                 int mediaStartTimeMs,
                 int mediaEndTimeMs,
                 long totalBytes)
        Respond to starting a load of data.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the source of the video.
        formatId - The new format of the audio.
        trigger - The reason for a chunk being selected.
        isInitialization - Whether this is the first time we are loading from the source.
        mediaStartTimeMs - The time point of the media where we start loading.
        mediaEndTimeMs - The time point of the media where we end loading.
        totalBytes - The total number of bytes loaded.

      • onLoadCompleted

        void onLoadCompleted(int sourceId)
        Respond to a successful load of data.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the source of the video.
